description: Torii Mifuyu`s Shugo Chara. Her image is similar to that of a child snow spirit. She wears a straw hood with a snowflake decoration, and she ends her sentences with "-suno". When Snoppe character changes with Mifuyu, Mifuyu`s ponytail holder becomes a snowflake and she feels no more nervousness. Snoppe becomes a X Chara because of Nikaido, but Amu is able to heal her.
name: Snoppe
